readEmail

public HltContentContainer readEmail(String messagePath,
                                     String headerPath,
                                     boolean pruneFooter)
Read an email.

Parameters:
messagePath - path to message text, a plaintext file,
headerPath - path to header associated with message, a plaintext file.
pruneFooter - whether or not to try to remove footer from message.
Returns:
an HltContentContainer with a TokenStream per message in thread
